messages.subject: Dai-Bosatsu Toge and misc. Shinsengumi notes
messages.msgSnippet: I remember seeing links for the Dai-Bosatsu Toge novels before . . . Can anyone give me the links again? (I didn t have the chance to download when I saw them
messages.messageBody:
I remember seeing links for the Dai-Bosatsu Toge novels before . . .
Can anyone give me the links again? (I didn't have the chance to
download when I saw them TT_TT )

Also, I'm currently working on compiling notes from everything
currently on my computer and what I have in my head. I'll put up a link
when I've got it all down. ^^;
